title: Respiratory Care
shortDescription: Respiratory therapy and support including oxygen management, ventilator care, and breathing treatments.
description: Respiratory Care services provide specialized respiratory therapy and support for children and individuals with breathing difficulties or chronic respiratory conditions. Licensed respiratory therapists manage oxygen therapy, ventilator care, nebulizer treatments, airway suctioning, and breathing exercises. These services are commonly available at PPEC centers, pediatric specialty clinics, and through in-home care programs. Respiratory therapists work alongside nurses, physicians, and other care team members to monitor lung function and ensure optimal respiratory health.
